name: Blood Storm
detailed_description: A convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area. Though exceptionally powerful, misuse of the homing feature when the enemy is too close can reduce its effect. Press and hold the attack button to display the sight, represented by a red square. When a target in range is captured within this sight, a positive lock will be established. A maximum of two enemies may be locked on at any given time. Release the attack button to unleash missiles, which will track the target or targets and explode on contact.
